scripts._build: npm run makedirs && npm run _jade && npm run _stylus && npm run movestatic
scripts.gh-pages: git clone $(git config --get remote.origin.url) output && cd output && git checkout -b gh-pages origin/gh-pages
scripts.push-to-remote: git add . && git commit -m 'publishing' && git push -u origin gh-pages
scripts.naked-build: npm run gh-pages && npm run _build && npm run push-to-remove
scripts.build: rm -rf output && npm run naked-build && cd output && git add . && git commit -m 'deploy' && git push -u origin gh-pages
